website_summaries.verdict: Despite some small downsides, the Sony WF-SP700N is one of the better truly wireless headphones currently available.
pros: Fits comfortably and securely and sounds good for truly wireless headphones
Built-in noise cancelling helps muffle ambient sound
An included charging case delivers two additional charges
cons: Battery life is only OK at 3 hours
It's a little awkward to get the earbuds into their charging case
Some audio delay when using certain streaming video apps

customer_reviews.title: This one didn't live up to the expectation..... on my way to return this ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I always loved the Sony brand. I have another sony noise cancellation over the head earphone, it was a gift (one of the awesome gift I ever got). but it was too big to use at work, hence I wanted to buy something small. As I was much impressed by the over the head model performance, I wanted to buy this sony earbud (not much of a price difference from other major brands). Problems: * Phone call voice was not audible . It was discreet. * By default right headset gets connected, everything seems good until then. After connecting left headset there is audio lag even in youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Rg

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The description in part reads, LONG BATTERY: SP700N has up to 9 hours of playback battery life during... This is not true. I charged these for over 12 hours and they lasted less than 3 hours listening to Pandora. I was really expecting them to last at least a full work day. I will be returning these and stick to Bose over ear which actually do last 10+ hours
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Manescu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip, buds stick in your ears when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Stable connection even in radio wave poluted New York City. Excellent grip, buds stick in your ears when I run or exercise. Noise cancellation - as good as I have in my Bose cable ear buds. Small, light and sweat resistant. Quality of sound sufficient for non-audiophile walking the crowded street. I highly recommend. This is what I was hoping to get from SONY.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr

customer_reviews.title: Best true wireless
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Sony was mdr xb50bs. I love the xtra bass a lot and decided to get myself a true wireless and chose sony WF-SP700N instead of Bose or any other brand as Sony xtra base is really awesome. Sony WF-SP700N is light , the noise cancelling is fantastic, xtra base is unbeatable no other true wireless brand can beat Sony WF-SP700N. The sound quality is so good that I can ditch my Beats studio2. Optional: I added COMPLY FOAM bud on both my Sony MDR xb50bs and Sony WF-SP700N which probably enhanced the comfort and sound quality. The COMPLY FOAM 200 series (i bought it on Amazon) is compatible with my Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Eggrollking

customer_reviews.title: Defective Head set
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective pair of ear buds. They would only play on one side, they played for 2.5 hrs, it took 7 hrs to charge up. Long story short they got sent back and I did't order a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: listen to me

customer_reviews.title: A mixed bag- great fit, terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love and hate these headphones. PROS - Best fit of any truly wireless earbuds I’ve tried (Jabra, Jaybird, Bose, Apple). Separate ear gels and wings maximizes customizability, and the fit is secure through the sweatiest workouts. - Relatively small form-factor - microUSB charging CONS - Terrible battery life. 3 hours at best. - Can only use left earbud for voice calls. - Case is large and doesn’t extend battery life - On-bud button cycles sound settings, but no way to play/pause/skip on the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because sometimes I don't want over the ear when listening to music. These sound amazing, they stay in the ear really well and I frankly don't have much in the way of cons to report other than the battery life MIGHT be a bit better but this no reason not to buy them. They work really well with my Note 9. Over all a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than Jabra Elite Active 65t
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are more comfortable than the Jabra Elite Active 65ts, and stay in my ears unlike the Jabras. The earbuds are tight to my ears (though still comfortable) and block out ambient noise. The sound quality is good. It's a little bass heavy, but I like that. There's an equalizer in the app that you can use to adjust the sound to your preference, but I like the sound out of the box. I was looking for a pair of bluetooth earbuds that were comfortable and had rich bass, and I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones but battery life is too short for practical use
customer_reviews.text: I liked these headphones. They stay in the ears quite well and sound quality is good. The accompanying app makes managing the options easy. Noise cancelling is not great but adequate for low noise environments like a gym but may not be food for flights. But the battery does not even last one gym session of 2 hours. I returned them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: vpr

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for about 2 months. The sound quality is very good. Their ability to stay firmly secure in your ears is very good. Noise canceling experiences have not resulted in very good results, although I have not used them on a plane. The battery life is very mediocre. I have gotten two hours of performance at best (Sony claims three hours). The charging case loses charge over time, so you have to frequently recharge even if it has not been used to recharge the headphones. This has been a very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blakey

customer_reviews.title: but there is a horrible white noise whenever the earbuds are turned on
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why it hasn't been mentioned yet, but there is a horrible white noise whenever the earbuds are turned on. Must be from all the electronics packed into these tiny things. Noise isolation/passthrough not worth extra $$, battery life or white noise their electronics probably create, and in my opinion are not very effective anyways. Sound quality is as expected at this price point. Overall definitely going to return these. Would have hoped for a decent IP water rating as well but nada.

customer_reviews.title: Shows its age
customer_reviews.text: Bought one that was marked used but came brand new and sealed just as described by seller. The earbuds show their age. This cam out a while back and pairing was a little more complicated than airpods. Sound quality is ok and is more than good enough for me. I will use this mainly for running/exercise and will be an upgrade over my powerbeats 3 since these are sweat proof. I never would’ve paid full price for these, but with the price I paid, more than worth it. Battery life is horrible though at less than 3 hrs. I would rate product at 4 stars and seller at 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: OK but lack important features
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds are ok. But, being able to monitor/see current level of charge; the charge unit has no indicators at all. You can't tell how full/empty the earbuds are until you connect them to the sound source (phone/computer). But other than that they're ok. For me, the charge usually last about 2 hours. I guess if you want to pay a lot more you'd probably get more features. These are good for basic use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mendz

customer_reviews.title: Sony wireless
customer_reviews.text: Going to return battery life sucks but mostly hard to turn on hard to get in case to recharge not worth .honey I paid for it I give a minus for wireless and battery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FIRST SONY DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I love SONY products and have been buying all my life with total satisfaction. I have never been disappointed in anything I have bought SONY until now. I bought these headphones new in July 2018. They worked as expected. The sound quality was good. The battery life was 3 hours of continuous use, not great but that's what was advertised so no disappointment there. After about 6 months, the left bud which is the "master" of both stopped charging, thus making the headphones useless. I tried to contact SONY support and got nothing. I will continue to buy other SONY products but will probably stay away from their headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman L

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating pair of earbuds though! Don’t waste your time or your money.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is literally 2 hours, sometimes less. They will not stay paired either. The left is master and the ONLY earbud operable during calls. Sound quality solid, and are fairly loud. The only advantage is comfort and how well they stay in place. I’m a trainer and I move a lot. I had no problems with them falling out. Frustrating pair of earbuds though! Don’t waste your time or your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sayko

customer_reviews.title: Avg at best unfortunately...
customer_reviews.text: Earphones sound quality for music works fairly well. They stay in the ear ok while working out too. The main reason I gave them 2 stars though is because the talking function with them is horrendous. It literally sounds like you are in a wind tunnel irrespective of if I’m in a quiet office or outside walking. You can barely hear anything. I’ve tried adjusting all the settings on the app while talking and nothing really does anything. If I could return these I would as I think there are probably better multi function earphones out there. Recently I have also had issues with the right earphone not turning on...
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I will update after additional use, but here’s my initial thoughts. Very good sound quality, and good noise canceling. However when watching YouTube video on my iPhone X, there’s a significant audio delay (where the audio does not sync up with the video). Maybe that will improve with an update?
customer_reviews.author: BenjaminGoHerd

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life, poor range, and huge latency
customer_reviews.text: The battery only lasts like 2 hours which is really short. The audio cut out frequently especially around electronics like microwave ovens. The latency is really large. It feels like half a second so you can forget about watching videos. The charging case also sucks - it's huge and you have to put the headphones in just right to charge them. You're better off getting some generic wireless earbuds. I got some taotronics one for under $50 and they've worked out so much better.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: These things lose connection very easily. I can just be walking down the street with my phone in my pocket, and these headphones will cut out momentarily. They also suck with keeping the sound of wind out. Sound quality is OK, but it isn't good enough to make up for the issues I've mentioned. I highly recommend you look elsewhere or wait for this technology to mature a bit before jumping on the "truly wireless" train.
customer_reviews.author: tboy123

customer_reviews.title: Not for a VOIP or computer app.
customer_reviews.text: They sound good, perfect for a work out or taking a call off your cell. Very comfortable and do a good job blocking outside noise. Controls use isn't the most seamless. Two things not mentioned in the advertising ( but they are in the fine print of the operating manual). Calls only come through the left ear bud which was disconcerting as I had music in my right ear still going on when I answered calls. Second they really don't sync with VOIP phone apps such as Ring Central which is why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Grainne

customer_reviews.title: Great, under regular conditions
customer_reviews.text: Got it from Amazon warehouse, item as described on the notes. For my POV, under normal conditions is a great headset but for the current conditions, that you have like 3 people on a room and all of them on phone calls and conferences, it's not that good. It does NOT cancel the outside noise apart from your voice, it's a noise cancelling headphone but is not a noise cancelling mic.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gym!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, very comfortable fit and is truly "sweat resistant" I don't use them at the gym but use them for outside work after being in the sun there's not much to wipe off the ear foam........ However I minus a star rating due to lack of battery longevity 2hrs, but perfect for the gym because who works out longer than 90mins? I should've gone with the Sony WF-1000XM3 it's battery life is 6hrs tremendous difference! "Noise Cancellation" is mediocre, so high noise will still interrupt, but if using public transportation or at a restaurant or standing in line at grocery store the peripheral sounds won't affect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall best earbuds I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Comfortable, user-friendly, and the different size earbuds made it great to find one that fit me perfectly. They don't move or fall out when I'm working out and are easy to clean. Best investment I've made to enhance my workouts and block out the rest of the world for a while. Flaw: battery life too short BUT still great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tony

customer_reviews.title: Weak bass for the price and even with noise canceling ...
customer_reviews.text: Weak bass for the price and even with noise canceling active I was able to hear every single sound around and I had the Sony app downloaded. Didn’t last 1 full hour with them. I packed them and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jcruz617

customer_reviews.title: Finally Bass in wireless headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several other brands that sound like they are a small speakers coming through a straw. Not the case with these Sony! Great sound with a solid bass. I am pleansently surprised with the quality. I had almost given up hope of a "wire free" set for the gym. That said, the case cover is pretty flimsy and I anticipate it will break in my bag pack when traveling. TSA is not gentle :)
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Finally Sony got noise canceling right. Great sound but few glitches
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, design, sound, bass, reception and noise canceling. However, few issues hoping Sony takes care of quickly they are mono calls, buttons on device are difficult to use, will update more as I use them
customer_reviews.author: itzme

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight and super noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends birthday and also for myself. She loved the color and said the noise cancelling is crazy. She can’t clearly hear people talking when she’s using it. However, I tried it on and the sound quality weren’t as I expected from Sony. But for this price it’s good enough and should work well when exercising because it fits pretty tight in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Tchen

customer_reviews.title: Very poor running time/poor noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not hold a charge for much more than 2 h so earbuds are not very useful. Noise cancelling is not really useful and does not make a significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ol

customer_reviews.title: Technology yet to be improved
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall, good sound quality, feels comfortable in the ear and it fits tightly. With that said I started to notice that the right earbud would come off it’s sweet spot inside the changing dock, so the next time I went to use it it had no battery life left, really annoying! Also if there’s a lot of wireless devices in the vicinity, be prepared to have your music cut off, or have no connection between the two sides.
customer_reviews.author: Felian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these bared on a review but it was really disappointing. The sound quality was trash battery life ducked and you had to plug in the car to have it recharged and it took forever. Not worth the money returned it after two days.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER BAYLEY

customer_reviews.title: Not Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: These would be great, but even after charging completely they seem to last less than an hr or two max when I should be getting 3.5 & 9+hrs with the extra charges from the case. This is the most disappointing feature as it makes them useless for longer trips etc. or even using them to workout reliably. I may have a dud pair but for now not worth it IMO. Sound great and cancel noise well once you change the settings to prioritize sound instead of connection.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound and ugly
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought some Sony ch700n over the ear head phones which I love for most uses so I thought I would try these Sony in ear phones for use at the gym. Bad idea. The sound was distorted. They look very terrible when wearing, and the fit isn't great. Returning these and will look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chessman

customer_reviews.title: Weak Noise Reduction, delay in sound.
customer_reviews.text: First let me state that I use these for listening to movies and music while travelling. They are not very good for that purpose. Specifically: 1) The noise-reduction is very weak. It makes very little difference 2) When watching a movie there is often a lag which makes the sound out of sync from the motion (actor lip movement). Even with the noise cancellation turned on they aren't any quieter than the Bose SoundSport Free. And the Bose don't show the same lag. All that said, they are light and comfortable and seem like they would stay put during workouts they may be great for sports use.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile (only a little frustrating for iPhone)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool wireless buds - I work in a very loud workshop and these are helpful. I use an iPhone and this requires downloading an app, google assistant was annoying (to me). Wish calls came from both earpieces and sometimes the call quality ain’t great. The charging case is a little bulky compared to galaxy bud case or AirPods and sometimes the buds look like they’re charging and when they’re not (?) I would buy again and enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the app
customer_reviews.text: make sure you get the app and set the sound quality to high quality instead of stable connection, if you dont everything you play will have a ton of static
customer_reviews.author: TAB R

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for running trails. They are excellent. The fit is comfortable and secure. The sound is great. Noise cancelling is surprisingly good. I tested the noise cancelling while driving. It does make a big difference. Even though the battery life is only 3 hours, that’s all I need for a good run.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Crappy battery life
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. Hands down better than any other Bluetooth sports earbuds. The downside is the terrible supposed “3” hour battery life. This thing constantly dies on me. I’m not sure if others are having this problem but I bought mine renewed from amazon and I’m regretting my decision.
customer_reviews.author: MrChengBang

customer_reviews.title: Total dud. No really, -it's bad.
customer_reviews.text: Would never expect these to sound like high end, studio headphones, however... these earbuds are soulless. Flat, lifeless sound... tinny and harsh highs, muddy-mids and lackluster bass. If you care about the quality of your music at all, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good. Cuts out randomly
customer_reviews.text: battery life is great but I only use them for a little over an hour at the gym. My only complaint is that the right ear bud will stop working for a second or two at random times
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not Bose.
customer_reviews.text: These barely stayed in my ears and the sound wasn't hideous like so many of the other earbuds, but they still didn't have the base response you'd expect from Sony. Sounded rather tinny even after playing with the equalizer and the Sony app. Not worth keeping, so ... back they go.
customer_reviews.author: One time customer

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies too quickly, even with the noise cancelling turned off. My husband works outside and was hoping for something that would last all day. He says it didn’t even make it to lunch, which is about 3 hours with non-stop play. Sucks I paid so much, his Walmart headphones perform better in both quality and duration. Returning this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for the hubby that does a lot of studio work and he was ecstatic. He is able to hear his playbacks without humming and background noises. It allows him to walk around with them in other rooms and when he is done he can charge them in the case and put them in his pocket. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Sony products. I purchased these looking for something that I could wear more discreetly at work. They're comfortable and provide great sound. They come with a nice charging case and different sizes for your ears. I tend to use the smallest size so I was glad to have that option. These are great headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Heimskringla91

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever! My brother recommended them to me. I can listen loud without anyone hearing what I’m listening to. Battery last about 3 hrs but the case charges the headphone when you put them in. I love the fact that if you pull the headphones out of the case, it automatically turns them on and connects them to your device!
customer_reviews.author: TerezaO

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these. I have had them for a day and the sound and noise canceling are great. I haven’t run the battery out yet but they will meet my needs. I can’t speak to how comfortable these are for in ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Battery life could be longer
customer_reviews.text: Best I have ever had. Stays in my perfectly. Just wish it would last more than 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Headphone review
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for a week now and overall I like them. They are comfortable and they have a solid build. Great sound quality and they are kinda low profile. But there is one huge minus to these. When you watch any video with them, there is a huge lag time. The audio is 3 or 4 seconds behind what your watching. Even after doing a software update I still had this issue. I mainly use these to listen to music because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: They are ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound on these but if I take a flight that lasts more than two and a half hours these headphones are dead. I use them for the gym and that's about it. Also, only the left ear bud can be used alone. The right is connected through the left.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Sony SP700N gives great sound but I don't feel any noise cancellation at ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony SP700N gives great sound but I don't feel any noise cancellation at my work. I am working in the lab with a lot of noise coming from ultra low freezer, ice machine, deli refrigerator, and Biological hood. I have tried Bose QuietComfort 35 (Series II) Wireless Headphones, Bose QuietComfort 20 Acoustic Noise Cancelling Headphones and Sony Noise Cancelling Headphones WH1000XM2 and all of them blocked noise but SP700N did not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: WYHU

customer_reviews.title: 10 for 10 Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable. I’ve had mine for a year and half. These have become a mainstay for me. I wear them while I play basketball and they stay in my ears pretty well unless I get extremely sweaty. They’ve been drenched in sweat, thrown across courts, put through the washing machine by mistake. They’ve definitely taken a ton of abuse from me and they still sound amazing like the day I got them. My only negative opinion of these is that the battery life could be a little better, but they’d be too perfect then.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Mazzocco

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life, decent sound, wouldn't get again
customer_reviews.text: - The battery life is less than I expected, about 1 1/2 hours on average. - There is also a noticeable delay in the audio. e.g. if i change the track or volume, there's a delay to where i hear the change. I don't have that delay with my Bose QC headset. + It does fit well and is relatively comfortable. + Sound is pretty good, but i'm no audiophile. + It connects quickly to my iphone when i take it out of the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CONNECTIVITY
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound but the constant cutting out of the signal between earbuds is absolutely unbearable and distracts me and frustrates me during workouts. Will be returning and trying the Bose Soundsport.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a short time but they are freaking awesome. The sound is crisp and clear with good bass. I love these earbuds. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Muzikontime

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but battery life can be much better, and connection distant is impressive, easy startup connection, noise cancellation is good and can use improvement to how it is disbursed electronically.
customer_reviews.author: Pulte

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I hate the case so much that I hate the whole experience. Give it three stars because I blame myself for not wanting to go through the trouble of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Moral Lizard

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too special. It connects and sound comes out. Base is ok not the best. Some times have to turn off and on device to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.author: eyob tekle

customer_reviews.title: Video Audio Lag
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good as long as audio is concerned. But if one plans to watch a video, there is high possibility of a lag between audio and video, which spoils the experience. This is very prominent when using the product to watch video on laptops. With watching video on mobile, sometimes the product works fine and sometimes there is a lag.
customer_reviews.author: Harshal Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality refurbished earphone look like new.
customer_reviews.text: Good balance of sound details and power, comfort to wear and can securely attached to ears in casual running or jogging. Not heavy user, but battery good enough for daily commute and up to an hour run. Connection is user friendly and easy. Size a bit bulky compare to some other similar products, and no volume control through earphone is a minor drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound, super fitting buds
customer_reviews.text: Once you get a good seal the ear buds work great on my Android phone and Macbook Air. For the price, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: lesmots

customer_reviews.title: Ok noise canceling but awesome convince.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort and decent sound, but does get out of sync sometimes with video and the noise canceling is nice but not very effective, maybe 50% but for the price awesome still.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Koefod

customer_reviews.title: NC DOES NOT NC
customer_reviews.text: *** BEWARE*** WHEN RETURNED YOU WILL RECEIVE A GIFT CARD NOT A REFUND***** I bought these to block out office noise as I work. The noise cancellation does not work. I continued to hear every sound, even soft sounds. I tried every instruction, even talked with Sony. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: OoBrenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for earbuds for the gym...these were affordable and I like the look more than other brands. Gives great sound...bass is excellent. If your looking for earbuds that are quality I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: Everything except the battery life was exceptional. Unfortunately the battery life was under two hours before putting it back on the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Don't fit well Poor battery life Don't even think about shock proof
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These little things have better sound quality that a pair of 200 $ over ear headphones I have I just wish they could go a little louder, the 3 hour battery life is understandable after you hear these
customer_reviews.author: Aidan p.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality 👍
customer_reviews.text: No distortion at all, even whith the volume all the way up. It actually does have noise canceling which in reviews on YouTube some said they couldn't tell. 5 different colors to choose from. Battery life is the only problem I have with these.
customer_reviews.author: Look Me In The Eyes

customer_reviews.title: the design is like that of a bean
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used as new and it came with everything logically open but I only spent 50 dollars I liked the price
customer_reviews.author: Eduardito Terrier

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I’m enjoying my earbuds. The sound is decent, but that’s what I expected. Unfortunately, the sponge ear fitting was too small and they fell out of my ears. I contacted the seller and was pleasantly surprised when they replaced the earbuds, no questions asked. This is a good buy but customer service is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Gkw

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awful!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is horrible! I can’t use them for more then 3 hours! Terribly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this product for a total of 6 months, the Bluetooth has failed to connect to any device. I have also spent all day trying to contact customer support, and nothing open. I have been a big fan of Sony products my whole life, and I have to say I am extremely disappointed with this product and sony's abhorrent treatment to their costumers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good audio but battery is extremely poor (also poor build quality)
customer_reviews.text: The audio is great with these. There is an app that goes with the set of headphones allowing you to customize the sound such as excited, bass boosted, or relaxed among others. The battery usually last just 2 hours which I find very poor compared to other wireless earbud models. The build quality of the earbuds themselves is very good but the charging case feels extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and comfortability are terrific! Battery life could be better, but overall I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not for PLAYSTATION 4
customer_reviews.text: You cant even connect it to other sony products like the PLAYSTATION 4 only to phones. If you are going to use a single headphone you can only use the left one you cant use the right one by itself. It's been 5 months and they still work though.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael G.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is horrible. The earbuds would also briefly disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Best sports earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied. These things clamp to your ears and will stay there even after a good amount of physical activity. Quick and easy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything else about these is great. They fit well while working out (cardio and all), have good enough sound quality, and connect very easily / work well with phone calls. The battery life is simply just not even close to what was advertised and I find them dying after a little more than an hour on a full charge... this is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds stay in your ear well once you figure out the right way to get them in the canal.
customer_reviews.author: Kraigles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound wonderful. Good bass good sound battery life could be longer but happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really good noise cancelling, it's okay for calls. The Bluetooth is awesome, I can be downstairs in my house or leave the phone in the gym locker and stills working. The case is very small and practical. Perfect for high impact sports.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Worth to wait for one more month
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Mine is yellow set, waited for one month to be shipped. But it's totally worht it! Cute, light, stay in my ear no matter how hard I shake my head. Sound quality awesome! Only down side is when you're on the phone, only left side has sound, I wonder why it designed that way...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was OK before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pairs as my gym headphones. Pros: - Design (very stylish and minimalistic ) - Pairing (relatively easy) Cons - Poor battery life - Connection was not consistent - One of my pairs stopped working and had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cena

customer_reviews.title: Right Earpiece Constantly cuts out
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these headphones but it turns out the right earpiece constantly cuts out audio. Very annoying and I would not recommend purchasing these as they don't seem to work all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W

customer_reviews.title: Great use for short work outs.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, battery does not last long on long work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Hess Pen

customer_reviews.title: Battery life questionable?
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but battery life sucks might get 1 and a half hours of use before recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hininger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless and noise canceling!
customer_reviews.text: These things are phenomenal! The sound quality is great. Good blend of sound and I like that I can switch between noise cancelling and ambient sound. The battery last more than long enough for a long run or workout and you can stick them in the box for a quick charge if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Revis

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is short
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is too short. Not convenient to use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan.W61

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews, but I must say these earbuds are amazing. Great sound. I would recommend you download the app to get the full benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: slow response
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds respond very late, making watching movies a chore. The mouth would move then the voice is heard. Very distrcting.
customer_reviews.author: C Ono

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Would reccomend. Battery life isn't super great but other than that they are pretty good. They stay in the ear very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just not great.....bluetooth connects easily and case is good for recharging- which you have to do quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Sockster

customer_reviews.title: battery life is subpar
customer_reviews.text: They are exceptional earbuds, however the battery life does not standup. I prefer independent operational earbuds and these do not have that ability.
customer_reviews.author: alexander pimentel

customer_reviews.title: There's a lag when playing video
customer_reviews.text: when playing video on my phone, the audio and video doesn't sync. there seem to be a lag. Also, with barely any use, the right headset started being distorted. when speaking to customer service, they seem to know very little about it, and offered no help.
customer_reviews.author: Yaniv Dabach

customer_reviews.title: Really bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure this was going to be a good buy, Sony disappointed me..
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the every 3 hour recharge these headphones are worth the investment. Excellent noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: EVER #1

customer_reviews.title: not price worthy
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is much shorter than stated. Sound quality isn't better than airpods given the silicon inserts should dampen the sound. Noise cancel feature isn't that effective. Overall an okay set of in ear headphones, but not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useless!
customer_reviews.text: unreliable, work one time and won't connect to the phone the next. on the charger for days, and then only partially charged - look and feel cheap. really bad product. have other Sony headphone which have been great.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Almost but ehh not quite
customer_reviews.text: The battery on these barely lasted a good 3 hours and they would would fall out with any sharp quick movements. The sound quality is great but I have a cheaper pair of wireless buds that far out performed these Sony ones
customer_reviews.author: Samuel silva

customer_reviews.title: i expected mroe of sony
customer_reviews.text: battery life sucks, sometimes its not even the 3 hours. used it for 45 minutes.( full charge) come back two days later it has no charge!
customer_reviews.author: Gift

customer_reviews.title: not incredibly loud, but still great
customer_reviews.text: The only con that i have with this product was that I could not make it ear shattering loud. which is probably good in the long run, but being a drummer my hearing is going anyway. The battery life is great, and the noise cancellation is alright. The cancellation blocks most noises for me enough that i can hear my music good enough.
customer_reviews.author: matthew hall

product_meta.title: Sony Wireless Bluetooth In Ear Headphones: Noise Cancelling Sports Workout Ear Buds for Exercise and Running - Cordless, Sweatproof Sport Earphones, Built-In Microphone, EXTRA BASS –Black WF-SP700N/B
product_meta.description: Color:BlackIntroducing the Sony SP700N In-Ear Sports Headphones, the world’s first truly wireless noise-canceling headphones with splash-proof design. Equipped with a cushioned fit and sweat-resistance, these wireless earbuds are made to fill your workouts with your favorite music without getting in the way. Noise canceling technology minimizes sound from noisy environments, leaving you with just music. Frequency Response (Bluetooth Communication) 20 Hz (Hertz) –20,000 Hz (Hertz) (44.1 kHz Sampling).
feature_bullets: TRULY WIRELESS: Compatible with Apple or Android cell phones, sync using Bluetooth connection & NFC
DIGITAL NOISE CANCELING: WF-SP700N headphone set minimizes distractions & noises for crisp listening. Driver unit is 0.24" (Dome Type)
AMBIENT SOUND MODE: Blend music & environmental sounds during fitness sessions or outdoor workouts
SPLASHPROOF: IPX4 rated to handle sweat or rain splashes when you're at the gym or outside running
LONG BATTERY: SP700N has up to 9 hours of playback battery life during workouts or athletic training
CHARGING CASE: Keep your earbuds secure & long lasting inside the compact, lightweight charging case
POWERFUL SOUND: EXTRA BASS delivers punchy low spectrum sound quality for big beats from each earbud
MADE FOR MOVEMENT: Silicone support fitting offers comfortable security no matter how much you move

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars636 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
